text: Hello everyone, I can't believe I'm just joining this community. I'm really happy and excited to be here. I'm Rod from Down Under. Looking forward to learning from those who have walked the path before me. I'm building an app for my employer that would be used as a CRM by the sales team. Anyone who have experience with HubSpot + WordPress + CRM I'm looking for advice, mentors, code snippets or directions. :smile: Sending good vibes all around
Hi! I'm new to the channel. We're currently without a dev, and I have a CSS question
